sentences.sContent: 'The vinegar sets the indigo and keeps it from fading,' he says.
sentences.sContent_eng: 'The vinegar sets the indigo and keeps it from fading,' he says.
sentences.sCn: 他说，醋可以使靛蓝变稳定，防止牛仔裤褪色。

sentences.sContent: The indigo plant was highly valued until the discovery of chemical dyes in the 19th century.
sentences.sContent_eng: The indigo plant was highly valued until the discovery of chemical dyes in the 19th century.
sentences.sCn: 植物靛蓝在当时的欧洲非常昂贵，直到19世纪化学染料的出现。

synos.tran: [染料]靛蓝，靛蓝染料；靛蓝色；槐蓝属植物

trans.tranCn: 靛蓝，靛蓝染料；靛蓝色；槐蓝属植物
